Package com.intellij.ide.util

Class PropertiesComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.SimpleModificationTracker
      • com.intellij.ide.util.PropertiesComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModificationTracker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertiesComponentImpl

    public abstract class PropertiesComponent
extends SimpleModificationTracker
    Roaming is disabled for PropertiesComponent, so, use it only and only for temporary non-roamable properties. See http://www.jetbrains.org/intellij/sdk/docs/basics/persisting_state_of_components.html "Using PropertiesComponent for Simple non-roamable Persistence"

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.util.ModificationTracker

        EVER_CHANGED, NEVER_CHANGED
